body.p: The proper grounding of your Eaton PDU is critical to the operation of the unit. Improper grounding of a system may create unsafe conditions as well as electrical noise that may cause data processing problems.Grounding for this equipment must comply with NEC and local building and electrical codes.The PDU contains a factory wired, green grounding conductor to a single ground point located in the right rear corner of the main cabinet (). Ground busbars in the PDU are bonded.
